## Capital Assets in the Federal Budget Process
A-11 gives rules for budgeting for federal capital assets, A-94 gives rules for discounting future returns.

Analytical Perspectives section of budget reports federal investment spending by category:  physical capital investment, research and development, and education and training.

National Income and Product Accounts track the cost of federal capital assets as they are consumed (estimated depreciation)

But capital expenditures are controlled by the annual appropriations, not special budget process.
